1.content: The night was quiet in the early hours of the morning. Sound asleep, a cool breeze floats over my body with a soft and sweet smell. The wind condenses to a mist and glitters down on my sleeping body. A hard pressure comes down and immediately dissipates. I still lay asleep when I am eventually woken up.
1.title: The night of Rachel

11.content:
"Rachel... Rachel....." I hear Amanda call me. I let out a soft and high pitched groan, feeling dizzy. "Wake up little girl..." she says, adding emphasis. I rub my eyes when my weight shifts upwards.

"Oh my god you are the cutest little squirt." Jessica says. Before my eyes can focus I'm lifted right out of bed. The first thing I see in the morning is Jessica's breasts coddling my face. Her exposed cleavage from a black cami holds my face as a strong and large hand presses me in. I try to step back but my feet aren't touching the ground! I shriek in surprise, but it's muffled. I feel myself being swung from side to side in my sister's arms.

"Come on, I want to hold her now." I hear Amanda say.

"Fine." her twin responds. Squirming, I finally get to see as Jessica's hands hold me by the armpits, as something soft and fuzzy comes to my attention. I let out a high pitched "EEEK!" as I'm dangling a few feet above the ground. A bright pink full body nightgown drapes along below me, as I see two small feet dangling beneath. The soft fuzzy felt feels warm with the white ruffles along the neck, sleeve, and dress lines fill it out. I turn forward to see Amanda looking massive now. I scream again.

"W-w-what's going on?" I squeal with a high voice.

"We just made some changes that'll make our lives easier." Amanda says. Jessica carries me to their restroom and into a mirror. My short brown hair dangles down and I see a shocked little girl looking back in Jessica's arms.

http://awarenessismyjob.files.wordpress....

"Looks like we can control a lot of great stuff about you little sis." Amanda says, looking smug and patting me on the head. Too stunned for words, I just stutter and start to freak out a bit.

"What do you mean control? You can't just do this like magic!"

"Actually, it kind of is squirt." Amanda says.

"Guess we should make her an believer huh?" Amanda giggled. "And I got an idea!"

"C'mon, you got to change her, let me do something." Jessica replied.

'Nope, too late!" Amanda said. She snapped her fingers at me.

My vision flashed for an instant, and I felt a jolt go up my body. I immediately felt colder than before, and severe tightness around my chest, torso, and butt. My arms were bare and no longer covered by a pink fuzz. Instead my shoulders were gently draped by a see through light pink fabric. As I turn to look down I feel a weight jingle around and I feel something heavy and warm. I saw a big pink rose meet me, the rest of my upper body was tightly covered by a solid and smooth pink top with frills on the shoulders. It was very cool and skin tight on me. It was then I realized it was more of a leotard as a stiff pair of briefs rounded my butt and smooth frontal area. Around the waist were a bunch of bows and a long, puffy pink dress.

http://everafterstore.com/media/dressup_...

"W-wha? How?" I stammered. I stumbled back and fell down making my two sisters look even bigger than before.

"Jeez, did you have to maker her so pretty in pink style? That's so...cliche." Jessica said, bending over and wiggling the tiara on my head.

"Stop!" I whined, trying to stop her.

"Tough luck kiddo, since Amanda got the physical changes you're probably going to be wearing cutsey stuff all the time."

"Well duh, I wouldn't let her wear anything else." Amanda smiled. She snapped her fingers again. "There we go, nothing but dresses and skirts in her closets."

"You are so predictable." Jessica rolled her eyes.

"Alright, let's go get you changed out that sweetie." Amanda stretch out her hand.

"What? I don't want to wear that stuff either!" I cry, crawling back up. The leotard riding as I stretch and the dress floating everywhere.

"Well, you have to wear something..." Amanda sighed.

1111.title: Go get changed in your new room, with your new ...

11111.content:
I had my back turned to Jessica at the time, but I heard her fingers snap and my mind clouded with a barrage of new thoughts flooding in, a painful, migraine-inducing sensation that made me moan for several seconds. I gripped my head, felt the mental storm subside, and opened my mouth to yell at Jessica for doing that--whatever it was--to me.

Instead I squealed in delight and spun around in the dress. "Thank you for the dress, Amanda!" I said, hopping up and down. Part of me tried to stop this embarrassing display of prepubescent cuteness, but my body and mind refused. "Now I can pretend to be the royal, English princess. 'Ow are you, love? Would you like some more tea?" I curtsied after my poor, stilted imitation of a British accent, and Amanda and Jessica applauded. "I can't wait to show my friend Tanya this dress."

"I know you won't," Amanda said, and then, to Jessica. "Funny the person who hates Rachel being cute makes her even cuter than I ever would have thought."

"It's a temporary thing," Jessica said, smirking. "I'll give her a few hours to act like this before we have the real fun."

"Whatever you say." Amanda turned to me, prancing about my room. "Where's the toy unicorn?" I asked to nobody in particular, and Amanda giggled as she picked me up. "All right, Rachel. I think it's time we stop with the fun and get you ready for school."

"Uh, no I'm good. Really..." I continue to backpedal.

"Hm? I'm sure there's something in particular all cute little girls like you love to play. Why don't you just say so." Jessica sneered snapping her fingers. A shot rang through my head and then evaporated. I felt a little woozy, as I held my hand to my head.

"Come on sweetie, we'll be happy to play with you." Amanda said lowering down to me.

"I... I want to play...."

112.content:
"There's no way this can happen! How can magic exist?" I say back.

"You wake up as a little girl and you still doubt it? How cute." Jessica says.

"Guess we've got to prove it to her." Amanda sighed.

"Oh, let me do it." Jessica said. "You got to change her, now it's my turn."

"Be my guest." Amanda motioned towards me.

"What? No!" I moan. I wriggle in Jessica's arms but she's just too big and strong for me. "This isn't really happening!"

"Oh, I've got it. Let's make you so you believe in magic and such cutie." Jessica said. She put me down and immediately snapped her fingers.

Suddenly, a sharp pain rang through my head for a few seconds. I yelped from the pain and it then quickly stopped.

"Ow..." I moaned rubbing my head.

"So what'd you do?" Amanda asked.

"I just made her as smart as the little girl she really is. Basically she's a gradeschooler in mind now."

"How could that work? I remember everything!" I say.

"No, you just remember being in high school. You don't know anything about classes and stuff." Jessica explained, flicking me on the nose.

"Now way! I do remember!" I yell at them.

"Ok little miss smarty, five times seven." Jessica stated. I was about to answer when nothing popped into my mind. I was sure I knew the answer but nothing came out.

"Uh....er...." I stammered.

"See?" Jessica smirked.

"Oh, you're good." Amanda applauded.

"No, I do know." I said, thinking further.

"Ok, if you're so smart, figure this out. Just a sec." Jess said going into her room next to Amanda's. She came back with a chinese finger trap. She put my arms behind my back and shoved my thumbs into each little hole. "A smart girl like you should know how to do this."

"O-of course! You didn't do anything to me, I know it." I began to tug on the trap and pull and strain. Instead of simply pulling out, the trap tightened and held my thumbs in place. I tried my hardest but I couldn't get free. I knew I could do it but the trap wouldn't let go. I got tired from pulling and I sat down, still essentially tied up.

"G-give up yet?" Jessica grinned at me.

"Now you're being mean Jessy." Amanda said. She picked me up and cuddled me in her chest. I began to sniffle from being so tired.

"God, you're treating her like such a baby." Jessica said.

"She is! We wanted a little sister to teach things to." Amanda said.

"God both of you suck." I moan, still tugging on the trap.

"And for that we're not letting you go so easy." Amanda sighed.

112212.content:
"I want to be alone," I said, and then quickly added, "so I can explore my room and see all my new toys."

Whether they believed me or not, Jessica and Amanda agreed some alone time would be good. "We'll come back in half an hour," Amanda said, and while I protested she told me as a little girl, I needed extra supervision. Once I got to middle school, they'd consider cutting me some slack, but until then...

The door slammed shut, and I stood in the middle of my room in a goofy princess dress, ashamed to wear it in the first place, but even more ashamed that it fit me. To an outsider I probably looked natural in it, a young girl dressing up for a tea party with her stuffed animals. I knew that's how my sisters wanted me to appear, and it was only a matter of time before they began parading me around the streets. Grandmas would walk up to me and say how cute their little sister is, how well-dressed she is, what a beautiful girl she'll be when she grows up...

I climbed up on my bed, not used to being the same height as my mattress, and tried to get comfy with the skirt frills puffing out every which way. "This sucks," I muttered. I wanted to say more than that, to cuss and talk dirty, but no swear words came to mind. Jessica's spell had robbed me of all my teenage language and profanity. Such an abstract concept boggled my mind, just like basic mathematics, science, and history. I thought of last year's English class and couldn't remember the books we read. When I thought of Dr. Seuss, though, my memory lit up. I thought of football, which I remembered doing throughout high school, but had no idea what the word meant. It became all too obvious, when I grossed myself out wondering what they called the thing guys have under their pants, that even though I remembered high school, those memories meant nothing to me. I should have known that from the start, when five times seven stumped me and the Chinese finger trap...but I preferred not to think of that.

The clock read "7:43." Only five minutes. Now that math I understood.

What should I do now? I thought. Half-an-hour was a long time to think about how much my new life sucks, so I looked around the room and considered my options.

"What happened?" she asked.

"This happened stupid!" Their little squeaks pierced the air as the blond girl shrieked in surprise. They were wearing pink and purple frilly dresses. Their hair was held by matching headbands and they looked adorable together. Also, they were both wearing white, choker necklaces.

"What's going on?" Amanda cried a bit more, shaking her sister.

"Quiet down! I'm trying to figure this out!" Jessica shoved her sister aside. I snapped my fingers out of pure curiosity, but that didn't do anything either. Then I realized the necklace was on the two of them.

"Of cour--" I begin, but then I remember all the torture and shit they put me through just so they could have a little sister that did what they wanted. I was their play thing, and now the tables are turned. I'm not one to be mean if someone's mean first, but these seemed like special, extenuating circumstances...

"What're you talking about, Amanda?" I say in a sweet, gooey voice. Amanda just stares wide-eyed at me, not sure where I'm going with this. "What's there to change? I'm your big sis and you're my little, baby sister. That's the way we were born."

Then it hits Amanda. "Don't you dare!" she yells. "That is not how we were born, that is no--AUGH!" The necklace tightens around Amanda's neck and fills in with pink. She falls to her knees, earning a concerned "All you all right?" from Jessica. But then she gets up, blinks a few times, and cupps a hand to her forehead.

"When was I born...?" she wonders aloud. "199...19...2004?"

"That's right, Amanda," I say. "I'm so proud of you! My li'l sis can finally remember when she was born!"

The day continues like that, as Amanda and Jessica succumb to their roles, and the necklaces fill out until they're both a bright, hot pink. By the evening, there's no way of knowing that the twins were once juniors in high school, on their way to college. I've reclaimed that role, even though it's as a voluptuous, blonde bombshell. I try to turn myself back, snapping my fingers, scouring my sisters' room for any spellbook or magic recipe, everything. I find an old, worn-out book, but half the text is borderline illegible and the rest is in a language I don't understand. Oh well. You win some, lose some.

It's not fun looking after baby sisters, though. They run around, knock each other over, run up stairs they might fall down at any moment. At least Amanda and Jessica could alter my behavior and actions to keep me in check. When I'm really frustrated, I wish I could control them like they controlled me. Nietzsche had a phrase to describe that: "He who fights monsters..." I know I've got the moral high ground, but...

As life goes on and I fit into my new role as Rachel, I look at my sisters and wonder, "Did I do the right thing? Are we better off like this? Would they have turned me back?" With no way of knowing, though, I truck on, focused on college and the freedom it'll grant me from my sisters, the reminders of the choice I made.

1122322.content:
"Change her back to a teenager," Mom says quietly. "Now. She knows about their powers, I realize, but that doesn't keep me from grinning brightly. In less than thirty minutes, I had triumphed over my sisters and would momentarily be rewarded with my old, male life. I enjoy the sad, angry looks on Jessica and Amanda's faces, and silently thank Mom for her help.

Jessica and Amanda look at each for a second, during which time I look towards my mom. I try to see the expression on her face, but that's when the twins smile and snap their fingers in unison. A vibrating, mirage-like blur clouds my vision as my body tingles, growing numb and malleable, expanding so I can vaguely make out that I'm growing closer in height to Mom. I'm almost a boy! I think ecstatically. Thanks to Mommy, I'm almost a....

I notice I still think of Mom as "Mommy," and even though Jessica snapped her fingers, there's no giant pain in my head signaling a mental change. Neither of these facts mean anything to me until the transformation ceases, and my eyesight is restored.

"There we go," Mommy says with a smile. "Honestly, girls, I already had to deal with your sister as a little girl once, I don't want to do it again."

Sister? I think. Oh no...

I look down, groaning when a lot of brown hair falls across my face. It doesn't keep me from seeing the giant, balloon-like lumps sticking out from underneath a green tank top and that same piece of fabric I saw Mommy wearing, along with a skirt shorter than any skirt I'd ever seen or worn. My panties feel weird, tiny in the back so they stick up my butt real far and I wince.

"I'm going to work now, but if you do anything like this again, I know how to take those powers away," Mommy says, now fully dressed in her work clothes. She wishes us all goodbye--calling me Rachel--and walks out the door. I stare at Jessica and Amanda, who listen as Mommy's footsteps get farther and farther away until the door slams and she's gone. The car pulls out of the garage and the twins turn to me. Jessica is grinning, but Amanda looks really sad.

"What did you do to me!" I yell. "I'm a big girl now and I have these..." I gesture towards my chest. "Balloons, these lumps, these bags, I don't know what they are!" I'm tearing up now, ready to start bawling, but Jessica snaps her fingers and takes the sadness away from me.

"We didn't want to do this, Rachel," Jessica says. "We wanted to get you acquainted with being female, teach you how to be a girl so when you grew up into this body, you would know how to use it. Now that you nearly ratted on us, though, I think it's only fair we give you a trial by fire."

"I don't know what that means..." I say quietly. I used to know, I recall, back when I was a boy in high school, but those days make little sense to me now with this mind and its smaller, simpler ideas.

"It means you're an eight-year old in a fifteen-year old body," Amanda says. She sounds really sad, almost as sad as I got a minute ago.

"Even more of an eight-year old than before," Jessica adds. "I made some slight variations to your mind, while I also changed Mom's memories, enough you probably can't feel it. It means you don't just have the knowledge of an eight-year old but a thought process and inner monologue similar to what a little girl would be thinking." She says this really meanly, enough that I cringe.

"She would have been a great little girl..." Amanda whispers.

Jessica shrugs. "It's what we had to do to get Mom off our backs. So long as she doesn't know when we use magic, we're fine, but if she realizes it's a spell, then she can..." But she doesn't finish the sentence. She turns to me, sitting there and poking at the fabric beneath the tank top, which feels like my princess dresses did: soft, frilly, thick and covered with pictures of roses.

"It's almost time for school," Jessica says. "Rachel, let's just say you'll have to learn quickly how the big girls act."

Deep down, I hold onto the hope that some time soon--maybe not today, but perhaps this week, next week, within the month--they'll tire of their new younger sister and turn me back. "Sure" he replies

Luckily my sisters had brought enough refreshments 'just in case I picked up any boys', so Tony and I relax under the shade of the beach tent on the beach blanket as we chat with one another.
We talked a bit about each other, in which I learned that Tony lives a couple of miles where I live, going to a different school but still close, and that he likes to swim a lot as well as surf, which I responded by mentioning that I surf on the beach as well (normally several times a year back when I was a guy). I mentioned my sisters
"Are they every bit as charming as you are?" Tony asks
"Sometimes, but a lot of times they can be pretty mean. Amanda can be a bit bratty sometimes, while Jessica just likes to tease me."
I then ask "did you come here with any siblings or friends or aynone in particular?"
Tony replies "Nah, I came here myself for some fresh air and to enjoy the water. Though if you are trying to ask me if I have a girlfriend, I'm still single status".
He adds "besides you seem a lot more outgoing and adventurous than most of the girls at my school"
You smile and chuckle as you reply "funny, there aren't really that many guys at my school who are as kind as you are"
I grab another bottle of water from the cooler only to also touch Tony's hand who was getting a bottle as well. We pause and gaze at each other for a few seconds before I scoot in a little closer to him as we continue to chat.
Later on, since it was 2 hours since I applied sunblock, I reapplied the sunblock, while letting Tony apply it to my back (which made me feel so gooooood) and the two of us lay down to soak in the sun.
After 30 minutes, I decide to make my move
I stand up next to Tony, making sure to pose very confidently as I say "Say Tony, since the two of us are experienced surfers how about we try tandem surfing" (tandem surfing is when 2 people ride the same surfboard - very difficult to do)
Tony responds "you know what, I am feeling pretty daring right now".

While I was feeling pretty daring myself as well, I was still a little nervous (hiding that I was nervous though) about whether my female body would be able to surf as well as old me (not out of sexism, but rather because it was a different body in general).
1323311.title: Keep talking with him

choices: Amanda and Jessica want a talk
13233111.content:
"This is a big one" I tell Tony who is right behind me on the longboard as the two of us ride the wave.
The two of us had spent the last hour tandem surfing, getting more daring with each trick.
"Are you ready for this Rachel?" Tony asks me
I looked back at him reall quick, replying "ready"
Tony quickly hoists me up to where I am standing on his shoulders (while he holds my legs to help me stay in place) as the 2 of us ride the wave.
We maintain our balance with the wave for about a few minute, before for some reason we lose our balance and fall over.
After the wave subsides, we get back on the board (sitting on it) as we start to chuckle out of exciting.
"You were pretty good Tony" I say
"So were you" he says
We chuckle for a minute before we pause and gaze at each other.
"Should I...." I think to myself "I really want to..."
I bring my face in a little closer to his, hoping to get some sign that it was time for me to do it...
Then then leans his face in closer to mine while also putting his arm around me.
"Good" I think to myself.
I then make my move, placing my arms around his neck and press my lips against his. He then proceeds to kiss me back.
"Goooood" I think to myself
Our lips remain locked for 30 secs before we pull away, as I went from feeling really good to embarrassed (though hiding my embarrassment).
"Sorry. I know it's still early for us to be doing that." I said.
"Ah no, it's perfectly fine." Tony says
He continues "In fact I was wondering if we might as well have already been...."
"A couple" I finished.

We head back to sand, as I spot my two sisters.
"There you are!!!" Jessica says
"And who is this beefcake here?" she continues
I respond "Jessica, Amanda, this is Tony my...."
I then wrap my arm around Tony's before finishing "boyfriend" as both Tony and I make a quick glance at eachother.

My sisters just stood there astonished that I had already gotten a boyfriend on my first day of girlhood while Tony and I, with our arms locked, simply walked past my sisters.

A hours later

After a good day at the beach (along with several more hours of Tony and I enjoying eachother's company as we sit together on the blanket, with hus arms around me, as we watched the sunset) my sisters packed up to head back home while Tony and I give exchange phone numbers and kiss one last time for the day.

My sisters were still astonished at my apparently superhuman flirting skills that they barely said anything to me. Though they were likely satisfied the 'results'.

I on the other hand couldn't help but keep smiling as for once I was not minding being stuck as a girl.
13233111.title: Beach Couple

info.brief_description: A more cohesive and better remix of the Big Brother, Little Sister Interactive.
info.description:
The summer is over and you're about to head off to senior year. Your sisters think otherwise and turn you into their own little barbie doll.

"Rachel" - you in the story. While you never had a good relationship with your sisters, it wasn't bad either. Stuck as a girl and the whims of his...er, "her" sister's whims. This is from the first person perspective from his/her viewpoint. Please write this way

The twins:
Amanda - shorty curly blonde hair and blue eyes. The girly girl of the two of them. Quite the brat when you get her going and she's very angry. Can change you and everything about you physically.

Jessica - long straight black hair. Sort of a scene girl but still likes her twin. Very dark fashion sense. Learned she can change you mentally to think or believe anything she wants, but would rather torture you by making everyone else think you're a girl instead.
